title: svAmiki sari
sahitya:
svAmiki sariyevvarana vaccu svara rAga sudhAnidhi candruDE


anupallavi

  bhUmilOnu sakala janalu mOdamutO pogaDa tagina sad-kIrti vahincina


caraNam 1    dharalO gAnamapyasincina narulella viDa mArgulayyOrani 
karuNatO vAriki bhakti yanduruci kalugu natlu kIrtanamulu jEsina
    caraNam 2    paradhana kAntAmaNula gAsincaka naranAdula golici pogaDaga dhIruDai 
vara sangItamu mOkSada maniyenci paramAtmuDaina shrI rAmuni bhajincina
    caraNam 3    gAnalOluDau venkaTEshvarunitana gAnamucE paravashamuga jEsi 
mAmakanE tana hrdaya kamalamaina mantramunanuncu konina shrI tyAgarAjasvAmi
